name: exporter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, country, or business that sells goods to another country: exporter of Japan is a major exporter of cars.

COMMERCE, ECONOMICS a person, country, or business that sells goods to another country: an exporter of sth Japan is a major exporter of cars. a coffee/oil/clothing exporter
FINANCE, ECONOMICS a country or region whose people or businesses invest money in other countries: an exporter of capital
